Key Match Events: Anthony Edwards scored a game-high 33 points with eight rebounds and six assists.
Julius Randle added 22 points and 10 rebounds.
Minnesota Timberwolves outscored Chicago Bulls 45-24 in the fourth quarter.
Nikola Vucevic scored 25 points and Coby White scored 24 points for Chicago.
Randle’s driving layup with 6:47 to play put the Timberwolves ahead 107-106.
A 12-0 run over 2:43 put Minnesota up 113-106 midway through the fourth quarter.
Rudy Gobert had 21 points and nine rebounds for Minnesota.
Mike Conley had 14 points and 11 assists.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Timberwolves stopped a three-game series losing streak vs. the Bulls and a five-game skid at the United Center.
Zach LaVine missed his third consecutive game with a right adductor strain.
